name: Pave The Way (Aboykiy)
description:
My submission to the Wowie! Jam 3.0 by Jonas Tyroller.

If you encounter a weird bug where your character seems to be hitting an invisible wall then just spam the jump button (space) I don't know why that bug happens.

A and D to move left/right

Space to jump

ESC to go to main menu.

There's 2 easter eggs in the game, comment which ones you find!
